page.title: 11 Community Schools
page.content: Education in Buckley and MYnydd Isa is provided in 8 schools: 1 Nursery, 2 Infant, 1 Primary, 2 Junior and 2 High Schools ,Elfed High (1070 pupils) has a purpose built sports centre attached , while Argoed High (650 pupils) has a youth community wing. Elfed Sports Centre comprises a main sports hall, 2 gymnasia, 2 squash courts and a table tennis/indoor bowls/cafeteria area. The Booking Sheet for the week ending 15-6-85 disclosed that of the 24 sports/leisure activities available, there were 1307 participants in 18. The most popular were Gymnastics (231), Badminton (160), Squash (154) and Soccer (134). The Argoed Youth Wing is used in the evenings by the four Scouting Associations, as well as by the Junior and Senior Sections of the Mynydd Isa Youth Club, and during the day by Toddler Groups.
